name: Debate
description: Sharpen your argumentation skills in our structured debates where participants present opposing views on current topics. Each speaker gets 3 minutes to present their case, followed by rebuttals and open discussion.
rules: Judged on content, delivery, and rebuttals

name: Lecturette
description: Test your impromptu speaking abilities with our lecturette sessions. You'll receive a topic and have just 30 seconds to prepare before delivering a 3-minute informative talk.
rules: Topics range from current affairs to abstract concepts
Judged on content, structure, and delivery

name: PPT Presentation
description: Showcase your research and presentation skills through our PowerPoint competitions. Participants create and deliver professional presentations on assigned topics.
rules: Judged on content, design, and delivery

name: Story Narration
description: Unleash your creativity in our story narration events where participants craft and deliver compelling stories based on prompts or pictures.
rules: Can be fictional or based on real experiences
Judged on creativity, delivery, and audience engagement

name: Personal Interviews
description: Prepare for real-world scenarios with our mock interview sessions. Receive feedback on your communication skills, body language, and responses to challenging questions.

name: Writing
description: Express yourself through our writing competitions featuring various formats including essays, short stories, poetry, and technical writing.
rules: Time limit varies by competition (1-3 hours)
Word limits apply based on category
Judged on creativity, structure, and language

name: Group Discussions
description: Develop your teamwork and leadership skills in our structured group discussions where participants debate topics and work toward consensus.
rules: Judged on contribution, leadership, and listening skills

name: PPDT
description: Picture Perception and Discussion Test challenges participants to create stories from ambiguous images and then discuss them as a group.
rules: Judged on perception, narration, and discussion skills

name: Quiz
description: Test your knowledge across various domains in our quiz competitions featuring rapid-fire rounds, buzzer rounds, and visual rounds.
